tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Al-Jinn, Ayah 8?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: This shows that whenever a true discourse reaches the ears of living people, it creates a two-fold effect—first, an open-hearted admission of its truth and second, a willingness to propagate its teachings
distractors: This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse gives rulings on trade and commerce
This verse promises paradise to the righteous

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Jinn, Ayah 16?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The entire system of the present world has been formulated with the aim of putting human beings to the test. Had there been no human trial to be considered, and had the concealing veils been removed, the people would have seen that, from the angels to the righteous among the jinn, all acknowledge...
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: And who can be successful by taking action against God. Therefore, the people who are affected by his call turn upon him
distractors: This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse explains the rules of inheritance
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
